website_summaries.verdict: In addition to an array of nice colors and no harmful chemicals, these long-wearing body paints are reliable at reacting with a fun, neon effect in the right lighting.
pros: These paints stand out for producing a vivid, neon effect under UV lights and blacklights
You don't need a lot of paint to produce nice results
cons: Some users gripe about the scent being unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: bought this a year ago thinking I would use it then, but just now opened it up this morning and WOW! so awesome! Learned a few things while using this kind of paint for the first time with how it blends and layers. I do suggest if you are using a brush to apply as I did... that when you want a nice even finish in the end, that you dab with your finger some fresh paint over the strokes that a brush makes. dabbing with your finger really helps smooth and blend into other areas.
customer_reviews.author: Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these paints to use for a photo shoot, and I think the picture speaks for itself. Bright, vivid colors, and it washed off really well! It doesn't seem like much, but a little goes a very long way.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun purchase! The paints go a long way; I'll probably have them for the next year. The colors are vibrant and the brushes give so many different textures to play with. Plus, the black light is absolutely essential! It illuminates the color far better than traditional black light bulbs, unless you're in a club that's only got black lights. I have no regrets in purchasing this set!
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT DOES NOT WASH OFF THE CLOTHING
customer_reviews.text: This worked great did exactly what I wanted BUT DONT BUY IT. DOES NOT WASH OFF I REPEAT IT DOES NOT WAS OFF THE CLOTHES I HAVE A PANTS AND T-SHIRT THAT IS PERMANENTLY STAINED WITH THE PAINT
customer_reviews.author: Cece DIY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent UV reactiveness, odd smell
customer_reviews.text: Cool little UV paint bottles. I know the size is posted in the description but the bottles were smaller than I expected. As far as the UV responsiveness, 6 of the 8 colors are phenomenally reactive, the last two are just "meh". I purchased them for my sons room, to paint some fake plants I placed under a UV bar, this paint worked perfectly. I DID notice it said that it was for face painting as well, but I wouldn't want to put it near my face...it smells like a weird fishy odor...very similar to how "Fix-a-flat" smells, or...well I'll just stop here.
customer_reviews.author: @theDavidLeachTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great for raves!
customer_reviews.text: I love this paint!! It dries quickly and stayed on during a sweaty rave hehe It washes off really easily and has an amazing glow once you're in an area where there is a black light. If you're using the same paintbrush between the paints make sure you rinse and dry it super well because the extra water on the brush thins out the paint and makes it harder to apply. I highly recommend this body paint for anyone who loves body paint and going to raves!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Easy on & easy off
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paint! Only complaint is that the blue didn’t really show up but every other color did. We do a glow night every year with our horses with glow sticks at the end of the summer and this year added non-toxic glow paint and 2 black lights to the mix and had amazing results! It didn’t sweat off as I was concerned but did come right off when actively scrubbing with water. I wore a white tank top that got paint on it and it was bright white after coming out of the washing machine (I was prepared for it to stain in case- going to splatter paint it next).
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Nuth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and starting out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally for some extra fun for a Halloween party I was hosting. All of the pigments pick up well except the blue and purple which is pretty typical for any florescent/black light medium from my experience. I then used this again for an attempt at doing a full body painting (pictured) the base coat is blue, but as you can see it barely picks up. As with most body paint, this does have a tendency to crack if you apply too much. I hope this helps! :)
customer_reviews.author: Roxxie

customer_reviews.title: Im disappointed with the consistency
customer_reviews.text: Im disappointed with the consistency, you have to apply it thick and in several layers. The paint dries down slow too, so wach out if you need to put on clothes or youre in a rush. The purple and white (same brand, different kit) dont fluoresce as much as the other colors. Its hard to do fine lines, more like a kiddie fingerpaint kit. Worst of all, it runs with the slightest moisture and BURNS if it bleeds into your eyes. Wont buy any more of this brand any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting like professional makeup
customer_reviews.text: I used this orange to paint my face for Halloween and was out for 4 hours bar hopping, lots of dancing. It hung on all night with primer and a couple layers of setting spray just to be sure. I love that it is non toxic and removes easy, I used coconut oil to moisturize as well as cleanse my pores after it had been on for so long and it took less than 10 minutes. Listen to the instructions, dont use it around your eyes. The skin around your eyes is extra sensitive and stings, but removes easy if you accidentally get some under your eye like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah N.

customer_reviews.title: Great paints!
customer_reviews.text: The paints were a huge hit--they are incredible. The kit included a lot of paint! The flashlight only worked intermittently though (we had to keep turning the screw on top so I'm guessing something in the connectors might not be touching perfectly). I would give it four stars because of the flashlight. On the flip side, I ordered a separate black light (from someone else) that didn't arrive on time because of weather delays so I was still very grateful that the kit came with the little flashlight! This kit arrived when it was supposed to, in time for the party I had planned :-)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Waxman

customer_reviews.title: Great Black Light Activated Paints!
customer_reviews.text: This is great Glow in the dark/black light activated paint!😍 The colors are beautiful during the day without UV/black light and even more beautiful once they are glowing! And boy do they glow beautifully! The paints are long lasting and easy to take off with soap and water. However if you rub up against anything too hard or for too long than the paint does flake. Still worth it though!💚
customer_reviews.author: Ti&Ni Daily

customer_reviews.title: Harsh formula, horrible application.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. It smells like ammonia and burnt my eyes so badly (applying to my face) that my eyes were dripping tears the entire time I attempted to apply this. The formula is thin and difficult to evenly apply... trying to spread it only moves it around making it patchy. Even trying to layer it, allowing it to dry between applications,only marginally helped. If you’re looking for something with opacity (if you can even get past the harsh, stinging smell) this is not it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Bottles were smaller than I was expecting, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottles were smaller than I was expecting, but the description is accurate, so that's my misunderstanding. Paint held up well for a photoshoot. Took a while to dry. Stung on the face though, but left no damage. Product did flake off during shoot after drying, but we were moving around a lot, so that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: It also smells like when I dissected a baby shark in 8th grade
customer_reviews.text: Only three of the eight colors are highly responsive. the green, purple, blue and white do not glow anywhere near as brightly as in the picture especially when in the jar. It also smells like when I dissected a baby shark in 8th grade. No pleasant at all. I'm unsure if i'd want to leave the house with it on because of the smell. I noticed it as soon as I opened one of the jars Other than the smell and the fact that only three of them are highly responsive, they're pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Gray

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the description. Scam!
customer_reviews.text: Does not glow unless under a special UV or blue light. Probably good to use when going to a club, but it was a mistake to purchase it for Halloween and expect it to glow in the dark. IT DOES NOT GLOW IN THE DARK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lika W

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack.. Will use over & over again!
customer_reviews.text: The paint bottles are smaller than one would think but they were perfect for a night out! I got lots of compliments on my skull makeup look because I added the white glow paint into the areas where the skull would be white and everyone loved it! (FYI i was at a rave so there were UV Lights everywhere) I don't believe they JUST glow in the dark. So be mindful of that when ordering. ALSO.. the paint colors are true to color.. so if you need blue it will show up blue when you apply and they will 'glow' under UV lights.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The colors were vibrant and looked great. I used this on skin and splashed it on our clothes too. On the skin this comes off easily with water. Wouldnt last all night though so you might need to touch up depending on what you're doing. This stained slightly on a black cotton shirt but it wasn't a shirt I was planning on keeping so it was fine. All the other clothing materials washed off with no stains. Mind you they were dark colored clothes. Worked good for the night nation run we did!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany M

customer_reviews.title: Watch out you might get half empty item and not able to return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for painting, one of the color is half empty. It is obviously been used not from the leak cause the paper cover between cap and bottle are not only open but missing too. The item was marked no return or exchange. I contacted customer service, no reply either. Regarding the product itself, if you are using it for body painting, I am not recommend liquid form. Since you can not adjust the sickness, it was not so smooth to apply even on the skin. I recommend using the solid color(with water)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint
customer_reviews.text: Paint was awesome. We used all the colors except the white one. The blue was the the only one that hardly glowed and we had a super strong black light, the other colors were great. The smell of the paint is pretty repulsive when wet but once it dries it goes away. The texture of the paint is a gel like consistency so I would think it would be hard to do an intricate design...we used it mainly for face painting. A bonus was it washes completely off with just water. The girls LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Only giving it 4 stars because the consistency is slightly runny, and the color is not opaque. So to get a nice, thick color you would have to apply at least two coats with PLENTY of dry time. But the UV light really activated these! They glow nice. Very stinky. Like fish or something.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to remove from hair and clothing.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a few different photoshoots and a music video and the results have been fantastic. The colors are vibrant with the blacklight. They are easy to remove from skin, clothing and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Yannayon

customer_reviews.title: Good, had to layer a few times, fun paint!
customer_reviews.text: Easy use, easy cleanup. My skin didn’t break out at all, even though I have sensitive skin. We only used blue and green. And WOW. The green was great! I hope the orange and maybe pink shine just as bright in the dark, the blue didn’t. However, it was still great tones. Does go on thin!! Two plus layers were added!! Does come off with sweat if you keep touching it or sweat a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: def a great buy
customer_reviews.text: kids, loved it, they showed up really well... i would buy these again and use them... they used them on shirts and there face... they worked GREAT... they said it didnt get hard, like most face paints will do.. they actually forgot it was on there face.. it went on the shirts, nice and easy and dried quickly.. def a great buy thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, not great for long wear.
customer_reviews.text: The colors were nice and bright and they illuminated nicely under uv. However, they did not hold up that well. I painted my face and it smeared easily and started flaking off soon after application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as desired
customer_reviews.text: This paint was awesome! It did exactly as we wanted to for my daughters glow party. We had about 13 teenagers using it on their face and arms and still have a ton left. It had amazing glow under the UV lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: just ok. come off really quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work the way it looked in the pictures but it may not have been dark enough or with enough black light. Tried a 2nd time with strong black light and results were slightly better. for body paint they do come off very quickly. If you sweat at all for get it. All of your work is quickly gone. So paint and hope you can stand dead still! They are ok at best.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Pocase

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of well glowing paint!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for shooting a video and was not disappointed. I got the 8 pack and it comes with a variety of colors. Most of them glow really well in blacklight though the white pigment wasn't quite as Luminescent as the others. I got some on my walls and counter while filming but the cleanup was easy, with no staining to the surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: I love it, however
customer_reviews.text: It isn't smooth or will stay on without cracking. You have to apply a lot of layers so it looks good. In addition, this product does makes your face/eyes have a really itching and burning sensation till it dries. Wouldn't recommend to use near children's eyes. I do however decide to continue to use it constantly and love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: karing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality very bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a fun idea I learned off the big bang theory show. They come off the skin very easily and out of clothes easy too. In black light they glow very bright. Good quality product. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: pretty colors but all over my packages inside the box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Colors, But i was very annoyed when I opened the Amazon Box with 4 different Items, The Blue wasnt sealed & Exploded all over Everything!!! But it was easy to rinse off... ha
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! I have bought several other face paints thinking they were UV reactive, but these are the best!!! They're bright and easy to use, and stay on really well. But they wash off easily, too! Mine came off with plain water, or with a little hand soap. Purple was totally non-reactive to the UV light and didn't show up at all. I haven't tried the blue yet. I got the .75 oz and it's going to last me forever. So fun!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZMomUtah

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This face paint was such a hit at our NYE blacklight party! We used blacklight strip lights and this paint illuminated from anywhere in the room. I will say the purple doesn’t show up well and the blue isn’t very bright compared to the other colors, but looks cool on its own. They’re also water based and wash off easily with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Herman

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Escape Psycho Circus
customer_reviews.text: My GF and I used this to paint our faces for escape. We went from opening (4 PM) to end (2 AM). We were dancing and running; obviously sweating and at the end of the day we still have our make up on! The only part that rubbed away was the nose due to blowing our noses and stuff throughout the day/night. I would highly recommend it. We got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, lasts long, easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Best Body Paint. I was super surprised with how eell this painted lasted. A solid 9 hours (probably longer to be honest) out in the heat. It with standed water being splashed on it, sweat dripping, light face wipimg. 10/10 recommend. The glow quality was great, it was easy to put on, and looked amazing. It works well on hair and beards too, plus it was super easy to remove. If your looking for paint that looks good and lasts.... buy this product, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors that do glow work great!
customer_reviews.text: The purple, blue and white didn't glow even a little bit. The other colors were very bright under blacklight but they had a very strong fishy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Emily grey

customer_reviews.title: Glows bright
customer_reviews.text: Concentrated and glowed well. Easily washed off skin & walls with a little bit of effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a video project, had a blast. They're very easy to use, cleanup is relatively simple, it all just depends on what you do with them. They're also very versatile, we poured some paint into a water bottle and were able to use that liquid for some effects without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids glow party
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 13 year olds birthday party. This was a hit. The kids had a lot of fun painting each other. Needs UV blacklights to glow. Next time I will use tablecloths and supervise the spillage and mess. Paint is somewhat difficult to wash off of the deck and tables (didn't really come completely off). I bought two of these kits and was just right for about 20 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Bird

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Colors weren’t super vibrant unless very layered. Also used a very small amount on my face and I broke out. That’s on me, but I didn’t have a reaction to it on my wrist. Also the smell. Omg that was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: chantalsaldana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Disney's Animal kingdom at night for world of Pandora and it works great!! Super bright under blacklight.
customer_reviews.author: Kierston

customer_reviews.title: I even painted small images and flowers for around 50 kids and paint was wonderful. Some parents worked with me to paint the ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for a party for my son's school. I even painted small images and flowers for around 50 kids and paint was wonderful. Some parents worked with me to paint the kids using stencils and brushes. It dry very fast. Colors like yellow, orange, green and red were the ones who bright even more. Kids were very excited and was wonderfull for their party.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Marcela Murillo Z

customer_reviews.title: Small but Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I say small like it's a bad thing, but it really isn't!! This paint goes a long way and you don't need a lot to get there. It's also great size for traveling! I travel for conventions so this was a great buy over all!
customer_reviews.author: Ryley Olson

customer_reviews.title: So shiny and clear
customer_reviews.text: so much fun and easy to clean but let me tell you if you have kids, it’s gonna be little bit messy because it’s liquid
customer_reviews.author: Khloud Moh

customer_reviews.title: Some colors work better than others.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to do accent makeup for a show that was partially lit with UV lights. The green and yellow fluoresced like crazy, but the blue barely glowed. All in all I would say the makeup is of good quality, and a little goes a long way for most of the colors. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not do not do not buy this product. It does not glow in the dark on the regular like it does not glow in the dark at night it does not glow in the dark under black light at all
customer_reviews.author: LETITICIA POSTON

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Except glow under the blacklight
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Except glow under the blacklight. easy texture to work with. Cleaned up super easy. The brushes came in handy, and the UV flashlight is a nice little bonus too. This kit was enough to paint 2 models pretty much head to toe. Would buy it again for sure. Nope I can find it without the brushes and flashlight, don't need a ton of those laying around. Love this paint!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed_r

customer_reviews.title: Glows nicely
customer_reviews.text: Glow nicely and I only used the blue but did test them all great product!! It does need to be a place filled with a lot of black lights photos attached are in natural day light and dark near a black light in the video
customer_reviews.author: crystal valdez

customer_reviews.title: I'll use it again!
customer_reviews.text: It glows really well under black light, and washes off easily. I accidentally got some on my coffee table and it came off easy. A friend got some on a chair and it didn't stain either, just a wet paper towel and it was gone. I was a little freaked out though when I washed it off my body then under the black light you could still see it. It was cool but I was still weirded out. Once you shower though it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need more of this in my life!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Used this for a special event, and loved how easy it was to use, no sensitivities, water soluble, easy to clean up, and so much fun to use! Trying to figure out a way to use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glow in the dark paint
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this glow in the dark paint for a photoshoot and I would say this did not let me down ! The colors where so bright and beautiful ! A little bit goes a long way !
customer_reviews.author: Sasharose

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Use this for glow parties works great looks great and is as advertised will buy more when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: rob g

customer_reviews.title: face paint
customer_reviews.text: a nice paint for painting faces for under U/blacklight, cleans up nicely, colors are vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hajnal

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: Buy this for a glow party great product and good value totally recommend! Everyone paint their faces on the party so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Omar Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Paint
customer_reviews.text: Great paint and very vibrant. Would buy again for future products when this kit runs out.
customer_reviews.author: William McKibbin

customer_reviews.title: Bought for night time bbq games
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of bonfires and cookouts at night. The kids play laser tag and kick ball with glow in the dark balls. I bought this for them to play hide and go seek or tag or whatever they want. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Disney Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun addition to our Disney World trip! The grands loved the glow for Pandora at night!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Schutz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colors!! Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a mother/daughter Glow Run!! Everyone complimented how bright the paints were!! Didn’t wash off throughout the race and all the bubbles but also easily washed off with soap and water! Can’t wait to find another reason to use it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: May have to apply a couple coats.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stuff. I wish I had pics of it under the blacklight but the event a neon paint rave so it didn't last long on. But for a dry event I think it would hold. I used a paint brush to apply mine. You may have to go over whatever design you do more than once. But that's no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not happy =(
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected. :(. It wash of very easy. Couldn't even have it for the festival painted that it was already out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Worked perfect under black light. Bottles were small but they went a long way. A must have for your next glow in the dark party
customer_reviews.author: TAR

customer_reviews.title: Bright vibrant colors that really do glow beautifully under a black light
customer_reviews.text: Bright vibrant colors that really do glow beautifully under a black light. If your having a glow party definitely would recommend this face paint. Last for hours and doesn’t smudge at all. Bottles are small but a little goes along way. Great buy would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not so easily washable
customer_reviews.text: It will wash off your skin fine but if the paint transfers on to your clothing, you will find that multiple vigorous washes will be needed...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick ORourke

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was AMAZING under black lights!! I used it for a youth retreat Glow Party. The girls absolutely loved it!! The only thing that I can say negative about it is that it was a little itchy for some of the girls and that when they washed it off I could still see it under black lights. Could be used as invisible ink! Lol! I think if they put a little lotion on beforehand you would not have either of those problems. Will highly recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Some of these are not nearly as bright/glowing as the others. Fun to play with though.
customer_reviews.author: bluegirl

customer_reviews.title: Peeled off easy. Not worth money or time
customer_reviews.text: Green was the only one to stand out. Yet peeled off in less than an hour and a half. Well not be purchasing again nor will i ever refer this brand
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: great product, super bright!
customer_reviews.text: used these for a college blacklight party and they were amazing! super super bright, and long lasting, and added so much vibrancy to the room! be careful though, the paint transfers easily once dried. it came off of the floors/table, but not my cargo pants so use with a bit of caution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue and Purple colors don't glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 13th bday party which was at a glow-in-the-dark place. The yellow and green paints worked best, the blue and purple don't really glow at all. But the kids had a ball painting themselves with it and the colors that did work were great!
customer_reviews.author: Redarts

customer_reviews.title: body glow
customer_reviews.text: i liked that you could get a paint brush into the container, the colors looked good with or with out the black light. the kids all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: albert white

customer_reviews.title: Great under blacklight. Mostly.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and washed off easy. The darker colors didn’t glow nearly as well but still looked good in normal light.
customer_reviews.author: Amra

customer_reviews.title: These paints are amazing. We bought them for a glow run and ...
customer_reviews.text: These paints are amazing. We bought them for a glow run and they lasted really well. They were vibrant and fun! All four of us racing were totally decorated. Then we invited other racers to paint as well. It was super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, arrived with the blue busted and a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not thick enough
customer_reviews.text: I like these for kids & just for play but it seems the blue and purple dont glow as much. Also you have to add multiple paint layers if you want the lines to be thick, full, and super vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Saturn Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Glowed beautifully. Thank you for making a "true glow" product!
customer_reviews.author: Pam M

customer_reviews.title: Good paint for the money
customer_reviews.text: Went on and came off with ease. Worked well with brushed and sponges.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyPRN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These paints are SUPER bright. The red isn't really red, more orange-pink, but it's hard to find red uv paint at all, the rest are amazing. It may not seem like a lot of paint, but a tiny bit goes a LONG way. I washed the paint off my hands after testing it out, and there was still some there, I couldn't see any paint residue, but my hand still glowed. I am definitely going to buy these paints again!
customer_reviews.author: ArashiWildcat

customer_reviews.title: Worked great under the black light
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a glow party, and they were a hit! Worked great under the black light. Only reason I cannot give it 4 stars is because people complained of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: jessi karzen

customer_reviews.title: Will not wash off white t-shirts! Lol!
customer_reviews.text: The containers are small, but a little paint goes a LONG way. Used it for my daughter's glow party and it was a HUGE hit!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully. Only need a little and it glows
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. Only need a little and it glows. I had some on my finger and wiped it off quick, you couldnt see it with regular light, put the black light on and you saw it plan as day. A little will go a long way with this. Love it. Super excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Megyan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Product works ! My daughter used it for a blacklight dance and her and her friends make up stood out, unlike some of the other packaged make up you can get at I party. My only criticism is that the package is very small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Balan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad that I don't know how to do fancy face paint because this paint was awesome. The little I did paint on was great the girls LOVED it
customer_reviews.author: Alecan2

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline Glow Party Success
customer_reviews.text: The paint was he used for an 11-year-old's glow birthday party. The paint works well, doesn't irritate the skin, easy to use and is truly magnificent under black lights. I would recommend using several coats of the blue paint as it doesn't show up as well as the other colors in the pack. I received my order quickly and thought the paint was a huge success.
customer_reviews.author: Scrabble fan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but stinks and crumbles
customer_reviews.text: It looks great under black light, but it produces a nasty irritating smell when drying. It crumbles if using a thick layer and fades if using a thin layer so make sure you apply more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Gabo Palacios

customer_reviews.title: A little runny
customer_reviews.text: They are bright but not a very thick consistency. Glows bright, but I left mine out for 24 hours to let it get a little thicker first. Careful with under eye use, the fumes can burn a little.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this paint! I purchased this for a party I went to the it looked great and lasted all night, super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena Mercado

customer_reviews.title: so far i enjoyed these paints
customer_reviews.text: so far i enjoyed these paints, they not super pigmented and takes quit a big for better glow, but they nice on the skin and i didnt get any irritations or any of that, was little worried about that part.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Love it- but not in my house!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a ton of fun to use in the bedroom... as long as it’s not your bedroom- or any bedroom that you care about as the paint does not come out of bedding/towels etc easily. Something to do at the local 2 star hotel 🤫 and it doesn’t taste good but it’s not terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: Holly ylitalo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great! Granddaughter and friends had a blast! Showed well - stayed on great - washed right off. Wish we applying it were more artistic! lol There is a lot of paint in the containers - great value!
customer_reviews.author: NVReader/Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and very bright. Washed easily as well. Only minor complaint is that when I painted my face, something in the paint made my eyes burn just slightly and start to water. It was the fumes of the paint, I didn't get any in my eye. It was tolerable and went away once the paint dried.
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: What you need!
customer_reviews.text: These paints were great and just what I needed. Easy to apply, seriously washes off easy too with soap and water. Definitely good quality although wish it was a little thicker but it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Highlight of the Party!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased these! I had them for my daughter's 12th birthday party and the girls when crazy for them! The paint really does glow and washes off the skin easily with soap and water. It was a great way to start the festivities. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Walton

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color in day and super glowy at night!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! So fun. Very opaque in the day and under blacklight. Washes off easily. Used it on my hair but also face and fabric- all looked great.
customer_reviews.author: EmJayEss

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 21 inch backlights in the room and this paint did not show. Even standing directly in front of. Glad I didn't get the bigger portion!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The formula is very watery which is a plus for removal, but causes the product to run if there is any sweat or liquid, it also doesn’t respond well to setting powders it sprays. The color pay of is also very lacking requiring multiple layers to get a solid base and pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: They glow!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to go crazy for Halloween with these but this is all I came up with. They have a thick consistency but could be a little thicker to make fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Stubing

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: The paint is a little thick of the application I was using this for. The results were awesome. Only drawback...The white didn't glow very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Moore

customer_reviews.title: stinky paint !!
customer_reviews.text: not fan of this paint..order it for blacklight party. first off this paint Stinks like fish when it wet. but when it dries can't smell it.but does stink .& kinda of thin paint have to reply multiple times. going try different brand next time
customer_reviews.author: JWood6400

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GLOW
customer_reviews.text: The colors DO NOT GLOW IN THE DARK as they said
customer_reviews.author: Chi  Chi

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about this product.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for a glow in the dark party. We applied with Qtips and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jan voegerl

customer_reviews.title: 3/6 work
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice, but I wouldn’t recommend buying this. The purple didn’t glow what so ever, The blue barely had any glow to it and the green was the same. The other three colors worked very well, but I wish I didn’t spend my money on a multipack that didn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

product_meta.title: Black Light Paint UV Neon Face & Body Paint Glow Kit (6 Bottles 0.75 oz. Each) - Blacklight Reactive Fluorescent Paint - Safe, Washable, Non-Toxic
product_meta.description:
Size:0.75 Fl Oz (Pack of 6)Midnight Glo is a UV Black Light Reactive Paint Set that comes with everything you need for a fun and awesome time! 

Whether you're going out for a night on the town, throwing an awesome Day of the Dead party, Midnight rave runs, or just looking to light up your next Halloween celebration, then this set is the way to go. 

Suitable for both day and night, this set comes with 6 vivid colors(Pink, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, & Purple in .75 oz bottles) and give off a bright neon color when viewed with UV Lighting or Blacklights. 

 This paint washes off skin easily, is safe, non toxic, and made in the U.S.A! 

 Paint can be applied to many surfaces which include your body & face (although its not recommended for use on the skin around your eyes), clothes(painting over fabric may cause stains), paper, wood, etc. This paint is perfect for night clubs, EDM music festivals, raves, concerts, blacklight parties, Halloween, black light party supplies, or any event that has UV Blacklight Lighting. Please note that this product does not "Glow in the Dark." You need to have UV lighting/Blacklight to see the awesome effect. 

Click "Add to Cart" to buy now!
feature_bullets: Blacklight Reactive Paint - Glows Brightly Under UV Lighting
Premium Quality - Creamy Texture that Goes on Smooth
6 Bright Neon Dayglow Colors in 0.75 oz Bottles - Pink, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, and Purple
Non Toxic And Safe for Face and Body - Dries Quickly and Washes off Easily with Soap and Water
Ideal for Black Light Birthday Parties, Clubbing, Festivals and Anywhere with UV Lighting
